abstract: The co-founder of Apple, who stepped down as chief executive last week, has focused on his work and family, not philanthropy.
snippet: The co-founder of Apple, who stepped down as chief executive last week, has focused on his work and family, not philanthropy.
lead_paragraph: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg NewsSteve Jobs, a founder of Apple, has focused on his work to improve the lives of millions of people through technology.

headline.main: The Mystery of Steve Jobs’s Public Giving
